author: martin
msg: Update some available versions of 1.3.4 binary package

author: coar
msg: inverting the logic and causing a NULL pointer to be passed

author: pcs
msg: The code to reject bad filenames was also rejecting filenames containing
characters in the range 0x80 to 0xff. This was preventing access to files
containing non-ASCII characters, such as accented characters.

author: coar
msg: Add conditional logging based upon environment variable existence.
Also add RefererIgnore functionality from mod_log_referer to
mod_log_config; mod_log_referer and mod_log_agent are now
deprecated.  The list of envariables to check is set up as
an array even though the current implementation (TAKE23)
only handles one; just in case we ever want to do something
